abstract: Kim Myong-Won (Hanja: 金明元,Korean: 김명원: born 15 July 1983) is a North Korean international footballer, who plays as a striker for FC Ulaanbaatar in the Mongolia Premier League. Known for his blazing speed, he's known in North Korea as The Chariot.
